data.name: The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante — Digital Content Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Purchase the Digital Content Bundle and receive the following digital content:

- Digital Artbook
Dive into the making of The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante with this 40-page artbook full of sketches, concept art and illustrations with developer commentary. English and Russian versions available.

- Full Digital Soundtrack
Enjoy the full The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante soundtrack, composed by Vasiliy Kashnikov (Mushroomer) and Fyodor Trubin (The Void Brother).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
